  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String name, float buyPrice, int incAmount, String increaseStat)
      Item constructor to construct various kind of items.
      Parameters:
      name - name of Item
      buyPrice - price to buy
      incAmount - the amount increasing specific stat by item
      increaseStat - the stat which will be increased by item
